news.title: Speaker Johnson says China is straining U.S. relations with Nvidia chip ban
news.summary: Nvidia's RTX Pro 6000D is made for the country. China has ordered companies to halt purchases of the chip. Nvidia says it is working with the Cyberspace Administration of China.

news.title: Mortgage refinance demand spikes nearly 60%, as interest rates drop sharply
news.summary: Mortgage refinance demand surged higher after interest rates dropped to the lowest level since last October. Adjustable-rate loans were also in high demand.

news.title: Eli Lilly’s obesity pill outperforms Novo Nordisk’s oral drug in head-to-head diabetes trial
news.summary: orforglipron was better at lowering blood sugar levels than Novo Nordisk's oral semaglutide, Eli Lilly said. The drug also helped patients lose more weight.

news.title: Fed set to cut rates, but forecast for rest of 2025 is key to markets with politics clouding the picture
news.summary: The rate decision is fairly pretty much in the bag, but what happens from there is anybody's guess. The rate decision was made by the U.S. Bankruptcy Court in New York.

news.title: Lyft stock soars 20% on Waymo Nashville robotaxi deal
news.summary: Waymo has teamed up with Uber to launch robotaxis in several U.S. markets. Waymo is now joining forces with Lyft to launch in Nashville.

news.title: The Fed’s cutting while the economy’s growing: Buy more stocks, hold less cash, this bank says
news.summary: The good times are set to continue for stocks, says a bank advising investors to broaden out exposure. The good times will continue, according to the bank. The bank says investors should broaden out their exposure.

news.title: Markets are pricing in three rate cuts by year-end. Here’s where to put your money.
news.summary: A rate cut at the September Fed meeting looks like a done deal. Be careful with stocks and watch the dollar. A rate cut is likely to happen at the Fed meeting.

news.title: A Ben & Jerry’s co-founder is quitting. He says Unilever and Magnum have muzzled the iconoclastic ice-cream company’s voice.
news.summary: Jerry Greenfield says he's quitting the ice-cream company he co-founded with Ben Cohen. Greenfield said he’s quitting the Ice Cream Co. with Cohen.

news.title: Nvidia shares slip to one-week low. A report says China has banned its chips.
news.summary: Chinese regulator moves to ban Nvidia chip. Move comes as Alibaba forges ahead with its own AI offering. Alibaba is one of China's biggest tech companies.

news.title: ‘I am highly alarmed by the proposed changes to retirement accounts’: I don’t want bitcoin or private equity in my 401(k). What can I do?
news.summary: “What are the options for safeguarding my autonomy over my funds?” she asks. “What is my right to my money?’”
